data.text: @soundcube Me too. Maybe try rationing the time on here?
@secretspartacus It’s virtually the only way I communicate with people - I see nor speak to anyone physically :(  - difficult choice
@soundcube I understand. Try staying off Twitter for a while and be kind to yourself. It’s such a nightmare out there in so many ways right now, we have to look after ourselves.
@secretspartacus Thank you - so hard having PTSD & ‘Betrayal trauma’ as this feels like another full on betrayal so it triggers into fight flight freeze 24/7 - fighting but getting tired
@dianabrighouse I will continue to shield too.
@soundcube Don’t let them do that to you. You do belong. Stay strong.
@secretspartacus My consultant has advised continuing to shield as far as possible.
@secretspartacus Government fails to understand that removal of all rules makes clinically extremely vulnerable people like me MORE vulnerable.
@secretspartacus Makes me feel utterly hopeless and that I don’t belong :(
